comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: You may find figure #2 appealing?  Not half as appealing as the boat holder - he'll never manage that darn canoe on his own!!!!!

comment.author: 7945368@N05
comment._content: What is the 1897 version of red-eye?  It seems to me that the fisherman has no pupils.  Either that, or the eyes have rolled into the back of his head, and this photo was taken just before he collapsed from exhaustion, being drained as he was by having to carry his curragh for bloody miles with no help!
